blogs.title: Dune
blogs.author: Frank Herbert
blogs.content: Set in the distant future amidst a feudal interstellar society in which various noble houses control planetary fiefs. The novel tells the story of young Paul Atreides, whose family accepts the stewardship of the planet Arrakis.

blogs.title: Foundation
blogs.author: Isaac Asimov
blogs.content: The story of a group of scientists who seek to preserve knowledge as the galactic empire collapses.

blogs.title: Neuromancer
blogs.author: William Gibson
blogs.content: A washed-up computer hacker hired by a mysterious employer to pull off the ultimate hack.

blogs.title: Ender's Game
blogs.author: Orson Scott Card
blogs.content: Set in Earth's future, where the world is engaged in a fight against an alien species.

blogs.author: George Orwell
blogs.content: The story of Winston Smith, who is a member of the Outer Party.

blogs.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
blogs.author: Douglas Adams
blogs.content: The story of Arthur Dent, who is swept off Earth moments before it is destroyed.

blogs.title: Brave New World
blogs.author: Aldous Huxley
blogs.content: Set in a future society where people are genetically engineered.

blogs.title: Snow Crash
blogs.author: Neal Stephenson
blogs.content: The story of Hiro Protagonist, a hacker and pizza delivery driver.

blogs.title: The War of the Worlds
blogs.author: H.G. Wells
blogs.content: The story of an alien invasion of Earth.

blogs.title: I, Robot
blogs.author: Isaac Asimov
blogs.content: A collection of interconnected short stories about robots.
